ModMetaData.name: Even More Backgrounds
ModMetaData.author: Flixbox
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a lot of backgrounds (animated and still) for the main menu to the game. Most are from Unsplash or Pixabay, credits are usually in the appropriate folder. All files are free to use, without attribution.
Make sure you check the "Allow animated backgrounds" option in the settings for Vanilla Backgrounds Expanded if you want the animated videos to be shown.
